scenario_text.value:
Did you hear? The people who went camping
have gone missing.

A teacher’s been running all over looking for
them.

And we’re supposed to just wait here
for now.
Holy crap. This is worse than I expected.

Takuma... They’re talking about you and your
friends, aren’t they?

(The teachers and students here still have no
idea what happened.)

It’s weird to go on a camping trip and then
just...disappear.
